snippet.title: Story-Driven Survival/ Farm Sim inspired by Don't Starve / Stardew Valley - Veil of Dust: EA preview
snippet.description:
This is a preview for all the new content in the Early Access build, which will include one branch through the whole game. Wishlist on steam - It's really important for small games! 

Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1593170/Veil_of_Dust_A_Homesteading_Game/ 
Discord Invite: https://discord.gg/mhhzZCk9JC  
Confederated Tribes of the Umatilla Indian Reservation Info and History: https://ctuir.org/about/

The free public demo is also up on steam. Players can expect 2-3 hours of gameplay Crafting, Farming, Fighting & Exploring the desert of the 1860's frontier. 

#survival #farm #story #farming #game #frontier #western
